actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Abdnor. With written report No. 98-116.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 178.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: An original bill to establish an obligation ceiling for the civil work construction program of the United States Army Corps of Engineers.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, from obligating more than $1,500,000,000 during FY 1984 for the combined purpose of the "Construction General" and the "Flood Control, Mississippi River and Tributaries" account.

titles.title: An original bill to establish an obligation ceiling for the civil work construction program of the United States Army Corps of Engineers.
